<title level="2" right="Creature 19">[Niodrhast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2341)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 414</row>

**Perception** +33; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense 100 feet.

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Alghollthu](/Languages.aspx?ID=24), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); telepathy 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +37, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +38, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +38, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +38

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +6

**Con** +8

**Int** +9

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +9
</row>

**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The neothelid uses its mind as a precise sense at the listed range to notice all non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 43 

**Fort** +35 

**Ref** +31 

**Will** +33 

+1 status to all saves
</row>

**HP** 445

**Immunities**
acid

**Resistances**
mental 20

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 20

**Dimensional  Wormhole <actions string="Reaction" /> ([ <%TRAITS%33%%> conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33) <%END>,   <%TRAITS%120%%> [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) <%END>, [ <%TRAITS%156%%> teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) **Trigger** A creature the neothelid is aware of uses a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect <%END>) Effect The neothelid creates an extradimensional wormhole at the triggering creature's initial location that persists for up to 1 minute. If the neothelid moves into the wormhole's space, the neothelid teleports to the same destination as the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +37 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d12+18 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rasping tongue +37 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d8+18 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 41, attack +33
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **5th**
[Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193) (at will), [Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=332) (at will)
- **6th**
[Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) (×3), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will)
- **7th**
[Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)
- **8th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **9th**
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Summon Entity](/Spells.aspx?ID=321)

**Rituals** DC 41

- **2nd**
[Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14)
- **3rd**
[Geas](/Rituals.aspx?ID=12)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The neothelid breathes a spray of acid that deals 20d6 acid damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 41  basic Reflex save). The neothelid can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**Instant Suggestion** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** A creature fails a Will save against a spell or effect created by the neothelid; **Effect** The neothelid casts a [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) spell it has available on the creature that failed its Will save.

**Lashing Tongues** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The neothelid's four tongues lash out in a frenzy at several targets. It makes up to four rasping tongue Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the neothelid's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the neothelid makes all of its attacks.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Large, 2d12 bludgeoning plus 3d12 acid, Rupture 31

</column>
